articles.title: Red Sox reportedly place reliever Jordan Hicks on IL after latest implosion
articles.description:
Jordan Hicks is sporting an 8.20 ERA so far with the Red Sox.

The post Red Sox reportedly place reliever Jordan Hicks on IL after latest implosion appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox place reliever Jordan Hicks on the injured list due to performance issues.
Hicks has an 8.20 ERA this season, raising concerns for the bullpen.
His absence may affect the team's late-game strategy and overall performance.
